name: CareRingerCompanion(checkonme)
0:
”Alexa, ask check on me”
”call in 1 hour”
”I am OK”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check on me
des:
You can say Alexa, "Check On Me" to start a conversation with Alexa. It will let you know if you have a pending check-in call, or ask you what to do if there is one pending. You can check-in early by saying "I am OK" or I Got it. CareRinger will know not to call to remind you to check-in this time. 

You can also initiate a check-in call anytime when you need help from your trusted contact(s). Just say, "Alexa, ask Check On Me to check in", or "Alexa, ask Check On Me to check in 30 minutes." CareRinger will call to check in at the time of your choosing. Your designated contact(s) will be notified when any of the check-in calls is not answered.

To begin, you need to register for the CareRinger service. For information about CareRinger and details to complete the sign-up forms, please visit www.careringer.com . You can also contact support@careringer.com for assistance. 

To use this CareRinger Companion (check on me), you must enable the companion skill and link the skill to your registered CareRinger account. When asked, you must provide the CareRinger participants phone number specified in the sign-up form for the CareRinger check-in call service.

Examples:

"Alexa, ask CHECK ON ME to check in" to initiate the next check-in call now
"Alexa, ask CHECK ON ME to call in 2 hours” to initiate the next check-in call in 2 hours
"Alexa, tell CHECK ON ME I am OK" to check in early
